casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. Peter MERCADEL
v.
STATE of Louisiana No. 2017-KH-0593 Supreme Court of Louisiana. May 25, 2018 ON SUPERVISORY WRITS TO THE CRIMINAL DISTRICT COURT, PARISH OF ORLEANS PER CURIAM:

Denied. With the enactment of Acts 2017, No. 280, § 3, relator's eligibility for parole consideration is no longer dependent upon a commutation of his life sentence to a fixed term of years, but is instead governed by the criteria set forth in La.R.S. 15:574.4.
